mean_cn: adj. 充分的，全体出席的
mean_en: attended by all the people who have the right to attend
word_etyma: plen 满，全 + ary ...的 → adj. 充分的；全体出席的n. 全体会议
short_phrase: a plenary session at the United Nations (UN)
sentence: We had a plenary meeting this morning; everybody was present.
sentence_trans: 我们今早的有一个全体会议；所有人都出席了。
